EmailTemplate.description: Form letter used when there is delay in responding to an email of two weeks or more
EmailTemplate.name: Form Letter - Delay Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: WGBH Audience and Member Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for recently contacting WGBH Audience and Member Services. While we strive to answer all message in a timely fashion, a recent large volume of correspondence has deeply impacted our ability to respond to our members and viewers as quickly as we would have liked.
On behalf of WGBH I would like to sincerely apologize for the delay in responding to your email. Because of the time that has passed I recognize that you may no longer require assistance.
If you have still have a question and it is station or programming related, please visit our website: www.wgbh.org. If you have an urgent membership inquiry or request, please call our member hotline: 617-300-3300 (M-F, 9-5).
Itâ€™s a highly competitive world out there for philanthropic support; our goal is to earn your trust and support every day. Thank you for contacting us and for your support of WGBH.
Sincerely,
WGBH Audience and Member Services
